scripts.dict:build: node scripts/build-dictionary.js __empty__ dict-sections bundled-dictionary.json && node scripts/update-dict-version.js bundled-dictionary.json dict-version.json dict-changelog.md
scripts.dict:check: npm run dict:build && node scripts/validate-dictionary.js bundled-dictionary.json && node scripts/lint-dictionary-strict.js bundled-dictionary.json
scripts.dict:normalize:style: node scripts/normalize-dictionary-style.js dict-sections --write && npm run dict:build
scripts.dict:cycle: npm run dict:cleanup && npm run dict:stage && npm run dict:import && npm run dict:check && npm run dict:lint:quality
scripts.syntax:check: node --check background.js && node --check content-dynamic-rules.js && node --check content.js && node --check options.js && node --check popup.js
scripts.dev:check: npm run syntax:check && npm run test:boundaries && npm run dict:check && npm run dict:lint:quality
